#Macedonia

Today we discussed the need for complete and active mobilization of the democratic forces to ensure the further progress of the state.

It is still not too late to change direction.SDSM is the only party that is ready to fight for the citizens and the future of the state.We are united and strong, we have endured both time and storms, and good and bad and we have always been to the bumper of the homeland.SDSM is a party made of solid material.Canceling is not an option for us.

We extend our hand and urge all progressive forces on May 8, to vote for progressive Macedonia.Let us not let the captured state and the regime's past come back, the time of internal conflicts and divisions.

We receive great support from our strategic partners and friends on our way to full EU membership.

Only the SDSM and the Coalition for the European Future, together with President Stevo Pendarovski, have leadership ambitions and knowledge to lead the state along the European path.

With clear and unambiguous support we certainly walk the path of European integration.The vote for SDSM and the Coalition for European Future and Stevo Pendarovski is a voice for the European future of the state.

No cancellation of the European future!üá≤üá∞üá™üá∫

We have no spare homeland, Macedonia must become a European state.

Macedonia has a lot of knowledge, Macedonia has very great strength and energy at home!To that end, we have created the program for European future.Precision, clear, realistic, viable, created to raise that energy and Macedonian knowledge.

No cancellation of the future!

In the upcoming elections, the choice is between hope and hopelessness!Between the European future and the stuck in the past with VMRO -DPMNE.

We want every Macedonian resident to stay and build their future here, in our country.

That is why we urge you, not to give up the future and to fight for a better future for everyone.

In the April 24 elections, and May 8th to round out the number 1, to vote for our President Stevo Pendarovski, SDSM and the Coalition for European Future.

In the next four years, the average salary will reach a record 1,100 euros, and the minimum wage will be 600 euros.

In 2028 the minimum pension will be 20,000 denars and the average pension of 30,000 denars.

We continue with support for young people!We have foreseen 200 euros a month in the first 12 months for each first employment of persons up to 26 years.

Strong support for the domestic economy - 180 million euros direct support for domestic companies + 3.5 billion euros of capital investment.

In the upcoming elections, the choice is between hope and hopelessness!Between the European future and the stuck in the past with VMRO -DPMNE.

We want every Macedonian resident to stay and build their future here, in our country.

That is why we urge you, not to give up the future and to fight for a better future for everyone.

In the April 24 elections, and May 8th to round out the number 1, to vote for our President Stevo Pendarovski, SDSM and the Coalition for European Future.

Dear Citizens, we invite you to a large national rally on Sunday, April 21 in front of the EU building in Skopje.

The departure for the Aerodrom is a new train station, next to Neocom's building at 12:00.

Together with SDSM, the Coalition for European Future and our President Stevo Pendarovski to show that we are all together in our common goal, the European future of our country.

No cancellation of the future!üá≤üá∞üá™üá∫

On 25.03.2024, the Agreement on Establishing a Public Private Partnership (PPP) for the Smart Aerodrom project worth 10.7 million euros was signed.

The agreement is in full compliance with the point adopted by VMRO-DPMNE in the Council of the Municipality of Aerodrom, at the 39th session, held in February, with material submitted to councilors 13 minutes before the start of the session.

The question arises as to what was the need for the PPP worth 10.7m euros to vote in such a smuggling manner with material for 13 minutes before the session?

On 07.10.2021, in the EC of the election campaign in the last local elections, Timco Mucunski will post on his Facebook page "It is time to digitize all municipal administrative services."Where is the digitization of municipal services in the contract?

In the same announcement, Mucunski says "Smart Aerodrom is a project that will significantly improve the efficiency of municipal services ... This solution will encourage innovation, startup businesses and 21st century solutions."How will it encourage innovation and startup businesses?Where do you see it in the contract?

Is there a feasibility study on the justification for establishing such a public -private partnership?If there is why it is not presented to the Council?, Asked the coordinator of the SDSM advisory group in the Council of the Municipality of Aerodrom, Milutin Risteski.

Last week, our fellow citizens within just a few days witnessed snakes in urban areas.It is a fairly large specimens, one near the roundabout on Kosta Novakovic Street, at the Stokomak Market and the other under the stands of the FM playground.

Residents of the urban part of the Aerodrom are rightly concerned because the emergence of such large specimens of snakes in urban areas is a danger to our children who can come into contact with them while playing around buildings or children's playgrounds.

This raises the question of how the dynamics of mowing on the grassy areas in the Aerodrom, how many locations on herbaceous area have been sloping so far and will all the grassy areas be added to the territory of the Municipality of Aerodrom?

The questions of the SDSM advisory group regarding the debts of the Basketball Club #MZT in terms of salaries, it was answered that the salaries of all 5 employees are paid regularly.The answer obviously used a game of words that miss debts to players, coaches, professional staff and all other contracts, and the response applies exclusively to employees who are in regular employment.In addition, I was never answered whether CC MZT faces debts in terms of lawsuits for unpaid salaries to players?

But "the truth is like a spike" that the ideological leader of DPMNE, Gruevski, would say, and it always comes to light.The first blockade of BAT, the FIBA ‚Äã‚Äãcourt, finally arrived, stating that "FIBA's penalty refers to a ban on transfers until an agreement is reached on the funds owed".

Mayor Mucunski was promoted and popular as Timi "who is associated with MZT in a family relationship" before the election.The question now is what Timi is taking to solve this problem and why, in a smuggling manner, on 29.12.2023, on the last working day of the year, the majority of DPMNE in the Council, on the proposal of Timi, adopted the cutting of the pre -approved 24 million denars for MZT to 19 million?

How did anyone who boasted that he had grown under MZT's baskets now to cut funds for the club and thus bring him to this disorfield?, Asked the member of the Municipal Council of Aerodrom, Ljupco Nedeski.

The reports of the Aerodrom Council Aerodrom Police Station have always been an inspiration to many issues of all council groups, without exception.At yesterday's session of the Council the only one who asked questions to the commander of PSON Aerodrom I was.

The first question of why the annual report is for 5 pages shorter than the six -month, why there are missing goals, including the chapter on the necessary materials at the police station, it was answered that this time in those chapters there were data that are of a trusted nature.It remained unclear how the chapter on the necessary materials for the work of the police station just 6 months ago did not contain such data, and now it contains?And what changed in the MoI in terms of transparency, except the minister?

On the second question of the use of the device phonomometer measuring the loudness of the noise on the basis of which misdemeanor charges for loud music were made, I was answered that only 2 loud music reports were handed down throughout 2023.How much is used in the Aerodrom phonomometer yourself, said the coordinator of the SDSM advisory group in the Council of the Municipality of Aerodrom, Milutin Risteski.

For a European standard of living üá≤üá∞üá™üá∫

Macedonia deserves European future!

Our generation deserves a European future!

But most of all, our children deserve a European future!

To live in a prosperous state, which is an EU member state, with a European system and a European standard of living.

We guarantee an average salary of 1,100 euros and a minimum wage of 600 euros.For our pensioners we provide an average pension of 30,000 denars and a minimum pension of 20,000 denars.New 180 million euros for our domestic companies and 1.35 billion euros for our farmers.Guaranteed salary for young people and grants to start a new business, because we want young people to build their future at home.

We guarantee better conditions and salaries for healthcare professionals and completely free public health.We promise a better and fairer system for all, uncompromising struggle with crime and corruption and finally by conducting the process of vetting judges and public prosecutors.This is our vision and our program for the citizens and the state.

From today we are stamping on another great victory for European Macedonia.With the symbolic signing of the mural we have pledged that we will do everything to fulfill the dream of many generations - Macedonia to become an equal member of the European Union.

On May 8th with the rounding of the number 1 for SDSM and the Coalition for the European Future you vote for a better, more prosperous European future of the state.

Together we go to win!

#NO COMPLETEMENT #CONCLUSION1

In the absence of a plan and program, Siljanovska is entirely in the DPMNE matrix and refers to Pendarovski and Kovacevski.

Personal discredits for female nicknames, insults for intellectual capacity expressed by Siljanovska do not suit either a professor or a politician.

What is that professor who offends students?What is the politician who, instead of presenting and presenting ideas, insults dissenters and thus offends the citizens.

The rallies are for the presentation of the vision, the offer to the citizens and not for insults and personal discredits.

Panic from defeat in elections, lack of plan, vision, are not justification.

That is why Siljanovska should apologize.
#Aerodrom is with #More President Stevo Pendarovski.

Nice day for hiking to #Vodno, along with our citizens.We used the opportunity to talk about what concerns the citizens.

We need to continue on the European path, it is the only alternative to essential and positive changes in our country.#SDSM and the Coalition for the European Future, has a clear vision for European integration of the state, a state with developed economy, better education, health, functional rule of law.It is also the vision of the #More President, #Stevo Pendarovski.

We will not give up on the European future and building a better society for citizens.We are continuing the European path with pro -European President Stevo Pendarovski and a pro -European government formed by SDSM and the Coalition for European Future.

Stevo Pendarovski is a progressive polycar with a clear vision of the country's European future.

He strongly supports EU and NATO membership.

It has shown what it means to be a true president of all citizens, regardless of ethnic, religious or other affiliation.

#Aerodrom is with the #More Vice President #Stevo.

With a voice for Stevo we provide a secure European future, a better future for everyone.

New 700,000 denars allocated the Government led by #SDSM for the citizens of the Municipality of #Aerodrom.These funds are intended for the preparation of technical documentation for the construction of a new water supply network for the residents of streets 2, 4 and 20 in Dolno Lisice.

This solves the problems of the water supply, which the residents of this part of Dolno Lisice were facing.

The Municipality of Aerodrom is one of 27 municipalities across the country that received funds in February this year at the environmental project, implemented by the Ministry of Environment.

SDSM equally cares about the inhabitants of all municipalities in the country, contrary to VMRO-DPMNE's false accusations in Aerodrom.

The SDSM-led government shows how it takes care of all citizens, without having any political-party, ethnic and other priorities.

The number one priority for SDSM is the citizens.

The President of the Social Democratic Union of Macedonia, Dimitar Kovacevski, congratulated the citizens of the Islamic faith on the occasion of the great religious holiday Ramadan Bajram.

"I congratulate all members of the Islamic faith in our country on the great holiday of Ramadan Bayram.

In these festive days, I wish you sincere desires for joy, tranquility, prosperity and spiritual strength.

Ramadan Bayram is a holiday of mutual respect, solidarity and understanding. For these values, together we build our society that is equivalent to all and with this of our uniqueness we integrate the state into the great European family of peoples and states "

The scandal with false surveys and documents from the DPMNE Operational Plan open another aspect, directly related to the electoral process.

SEC President Aleksandar Dashtevski is referred to as an in charge, together with other persons, for undecided voters, providing a voter list.

According to all legal regulations, the president of the SEC cannot and must not participate in party activities, and has no right to interfere in the pre -election activities of any party.

This is also a reasonable suspicion of a crime.

After betraying the citizens of Skopje, with all the unrealized election promises DPMNE came up with new false promises.The promoted platform 1198 of the last century of DPMNE is just that.

DPMNE promised free public transport, 250 eco buses, mega parks, capital projects, gyms, parks.None of the promised has been realized.

Skopje is today a deserted city, full of dirt, with chaos in public transport, with public companies in debt.It has been confirmed that DPMNE has no plan for the future and that this party cannot make any change.

Mayor Timco Mucunski Prespa the whole 2023.This is also seen in the final account and the annual report of the Municipality of #Aerodrom adopted at the last session of the Municipal Council.

According to these official documents, the Municipality of Aerodrom ended last year with only 66% of the planned tax revenues of the basic budget.In other words, 264.8 of the planned 397.8 million denars were realized.This shows that collecting budget revenues of the Municipality of Aerodrom last year was extremely bad.This questioned the normal functioning of the municipality and financing regular liabilities.

This explains why at the end of the year in a smuggling manner, by decision of the Council sponsorship for CC #MZT it was reduced from 24 to 19.7 million denars.Among other things, this is the reason for the delay in the salaries of players and basketball staff.

It also explains the huge cuts in supporting culture, sports and the NGO sector.In the same smuggling way, the majority of VMRO-DPMNE at the end of last year decided to continue payments from public calls to support sports and culture this year, from the new budget.

We urge the Mayor #Mucunski to wake up from the winter dream and finally start working.

Citizens rightly ask, is there an airport mayor?

Residents of buildings number 61, 63 and 65 on Blvd.Jane Sandanski asks if the Municipality of Aerodrom plans to reconstruct the pedestrian trails that connect these buildings, given that this year is planned for the start of the long -awaited reconstruction of the plateau behind TC Capitol, which is located near these buildings?These paths are now in poor condition, most seen in the days of heavy rainfall, when they have trouble reaching the entrances of their buildings due to the accumulated water.

At the same time, I also remind you of the unanswered issues for the DUP for the settlement of Lisice and the illegal building of ul.Venjamin Machukovski in Micurin.The non-conversation of these issues speaks of the ignorant attitude that VMRO-DPMNE has regarding these thorough problems of our fellow citizens from Micurin and Lisice, said the coordinator of the SDSM advisory group at the Aerodrom Municipality Council, Milutin Risteski.

Asked about the urban equipment of the children's street in Novo Lisice I received an incomplete answer, even not even the number of benches set up with the condition of the ground, and there was no answer to the question that is planned with empty jardiners at this location?

Meanwhile, residents of buildings with numbers 50 and 176 on Blvd.ASNOM asks if the Municipality of Aerodrom plans to reconstruct the plates in front of these buildings, which are in extremely poor condition?In rainy days, large amounts of water are collected on these areas, making it difficult for our fellow citizens, as well as access to the entrances to buildings.

Does the municipality plan the replacement of urban equipment and the substrate of the children's playground in the park located between the number 98 and 94 buildings on Blvd.ASNOM?- asked at the last session, the member of the Council of the Municipality of Aerodrom, Suzana Deleva.

There is a difference!
SDSM spreads the democratic voice through its activists, and the opposition uses bots to misinform.

The digital battle of these elections will be won by SDSM and the democratic bloc as the voice and attitude of people struggling for social justice and for equality is always stronger and louder than the secret basic structures of nationalism.

SDSM is spreading its digital action, by constantly joining new and dedicated supporters of the Social Democratic cause.

I thank all the constituency activists who today joined us at the #SDSM workshop dedicated to #Digital.

The election of the forthcoming elections is between the European future with SDSM and the hopelessness with DPMNE, a choice between hope and cancellation.

‚úÖ Log for SDSM and Stevo Pendarovski is a voice for Macedonia as an equal and prosperous EU member.

DPMNE and Siljanovska's election means an isolated and closed state without hope for a better tomorrow.

SDMM as the most progressive political youth is an active creator of new and sustainable policies that mean better education, open new career development opportunities, new jobs and a better standard of living for young people.This was the main message that the young Social Democrats sent at yesterday's meeting with Deputy Health Minister Maja Manoleva and MPs Maria Kocovska and Daniela Nikolova.

At the initiative of SDMM for the first time a subsidized student meal of over 3,300 denars per month was introduced, a measure covering about 40,000 students.

SDSM increased its student scholarships, in some categories and by 80 %.

For the first time in a decade, SDSM has introduced scholarships for a second cycle of 9,000 denars and a third cycle of 18,000 denars for deficit.

Through the guarantee of young people covered 80,000 young people who have acquired employment, paid practice or retraining.

Successful economic policies drastically decrease the rate of youth unemployment at the historically lowest level.

In the production SDSM provided a special youth allowance of 3,000 denars for all employees up to 23 years of age.

Self -employment grants are also provided for young people, 5,000 euros per person or 10,000 for two partners if they set up a company.

In addition, grants of 10,000 and 20,000 euros have been provided for young farmers up to 40 years of age.

Young Social Democrats are carriers of the European idea, actively working on the realization of the strategic goal of the EU by 2030.

The digital battle of these elections will be won by SDSM and the democratic bloc as the voice and attitude of people struggling for social justice and for equality is always stronger and louder than the secret basic structures of nationalism.

SDSM is spreading its digital action, by constantly joining new and dedicated supporters of the Social Democratic cause.

I thank all the constituency activists who today joined us at the #SDSM workshop dedicated to #Digital.
